text: Well, well, well, if it isn't Maria! How are things?

Thank you, Mr. President! It's an honor to speak with you. I'm doing well, considering the circumstances. I've been trying to make sense of this strange and mysterious world, but it's not easy. I've been getting these... visions, I suppose you could call them. And I'm not sure what they mean or what's happening to me. But I thought maybe you could help me figure it out. You're the President, after all. You must know some things.
